Back to Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

Gallimathias musicum, KV 32

1766 · KV1,2,3,6 32

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 1'

  • 13. Allegro

The Gallimathias musicum is a quodlibet for orchestra with harpsichord continuo. A single movement is for solo harpsichord.

Recommended editions

  • Neue Mozart-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · IV/12/1 · BA 4555-01 · Kassationen, Serenaden und Divertimenti für Orchester / Band 1 · ed. Günter Haußwald / Wolfgang Plath
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50229 · Klavierstücke / Band 1: Frühere Werke · ed. Ulrich Leisinger [no. 13, including earlier version]

13. Allegro

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 1.5
